elements.title: Eliq
elements.description: Eliq provides software to monitor electricity usage and demand patterns. It takes information from smart metering, connected devices and weather analytics and interprets this to provide instant energy insights and promote efficiency. Awarded phase 2 of UK gov [SENS competition](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/smart-energy-savings-sens-competition)

elements.title: EnPowered
elements.description: Canada based EnPowered has a platform that measures Rates, capacity or demand charges, delivery fees - market spikes drive up costs in energy bills, making forecasts to plan usage and avoid costly events.

elements.title: Smap Energy
elements.description: SMAP Energy originated from research at the University of Cambridge. In collaboration with our academic and industrial partners, weâ€™ve developed novel machine learning and AI techniques and products that take advantage of growing smart meter data reserves. [Acquired by Japanese firm ENECHANGE](https://www.current-news.co.uk/news/smart-meter-data-firm-smap-energy-snapped-up-by-enechange) in March 2021

elements.title: Green button data
elements.description: The [Green Button initiative](https://www.greenbuttonalliance.org/about) is an industry-led effort to respond to a White House call-to-action to provide electricity customers with easy access to their energy usage data in a consumer-friendly and computer-friendly format.

elements.title: Myst AI
elements.description: We use artificial intelligence to help energy companies better predict the future, resulting in lower costs, reduced risk and less waste. Secured $6M [series A funding](https://news.crunchbase.com/news/myst-ai-closes-6m-series-a-to-forecast-energy-demand-supply/) in Sept 2020

elements.title: Utility API
elements.description: Utility API , Web api platform for energy consumption and bills
